verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A lily in the midst of thorns,
The King of kings adorns you.
Your feet are cleansed as you walk,
Loving Him Who found you.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are called to do His will
On the land beneath your feet.
The Lord delights in this land;
It is called married.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
A lamb in the midst of wolves,
The Lord of lords surrounds you.
Your feet are cleansed as you walk,
Trusting Him Who found you.
